content.text: Welcome to today's blog promoting the publication of Agent Update: issue 87.
In the Technical Updates and Reminders section we continue to bring you important COVID-19 updates, including the Coronavirus Job Retention Scheme.
Other topics included are VAT reverse charge, Making Tax Digital, EU settlement scheme and basis period reform consultation.
Some of the highlights in the HMRC Agent Services section include Agent talking Points and support for customers who need extra help.
We hope you find this edition informative and don’t forget the next Agent Update is scheduled for September 2021.
Did you know that you can receive email alerts telling you about the latest publication of Agent Update?
